short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PartsCheck provides individualised support to our clients.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PartsCheck is a web based program that helps automotive repairers connect to suppliers, streamlining the process of sourcing parts. It allows repairers to get quotes, process orders, receive parts and manage credits in one centralised location. It is PartsCheckâ€™s aim to deliver an innovative product that make our customers' lives better, easier and more profitable through increased functionality and simplicity while being environmentally conscious.

This extension is for existing PartsCheck Clients, it provides additional features for clients to help them make use of the quoting/ordering of PartsCheck, the features provided are on a Quote Package basis and differ between them.

Merimen:
- Allows sending of Quotes to PartsCheck
